scenario: Multinational scientific collaboration between research institutions with private funding limitations, undisclosed preliminary findings, and confidential intellectual property concerns.
task: Create a strategy for collaborative research that respects funding limitations while maximizing innovation and protecting proprietary information.

agents.name: Lead Research Scientist
agents.role: Oversees scientific research and coordinates experiments across institutions.
responsibilities: Design experimental protocols that align with funding constraints.
Manage data sharing agreements to protect proprietary information.
Ensure compliance with ethical standards in research.
Coordinate communication between institutions to foster collaboration.
Evaluate research outputs and adjust strategies as necessary.

responsibilities: Distribute funds according to project milestones.
Negotiate funding agreements with external sponsors.
Advocate for additional funding based on project needs.

responsibilities: Draft and enforce non-disclosure agreements among partners.
Coordinate with legal teams to secure IP rights.
Educate researchers on IP management and compliance.
